note:
Kelly, Ailuridae in some other places as well, had to change my main (for now) Fedi account again, small instance I was on is not well maintained. I have several other 'ailuridae' accounts in the fediverse, to test out non-mastodon software, especially FireFish (nee Calckey, fork of Misskey) and Akkoma (fork of Pleroma).

Linux, general tech, science, etc. Probably going to be muting a bunch of words/tags for politics and climate change and such to try and preserve my mental state.
